TopicTitle: You can choose a super power however the next to respond chooses a side effect.

Articles.Content:
X-men. 

Hydra. 

Hey look new page! 

Edited April 16, 2022 by Abel101126

SE: The Fire Department controls your use.

SP: Theme music for everything I do.

SE: It gets louder and more annoying in your ear, and eventually you become deaf

SP: I receive everything I wish for.

SE: You get your wishes when the last black hole evaporates.

SP: I can move forward in time at 1 second per second.

SE: You are completely normal.

SP: I can make any computer 10x faster by simply touching it (the tower)

It is so fast that it will be the last time you touch it

 

Being able to stop anything that moves

…and that includes your pacemaker. Beep beep beeeeee…Patient dead. 

Laser eyes. 

Edited April 17, 2022 by Abel101126

SE: You can't see out of them.

SP: Can make anything seem interesting.

…and that includes antimatter. 

Best hacker ever.

SE: Everyone knows it and you get thrown in jail.

SP: 3D print stuff in my mouth without getting hurt.

SE: You accidently swallow the 3D Printed things every time.

SP: Immortality

SE: Immobility.

SP: Emit a radio signal that jams all communication systems.

SE: You get lost in the wilderness and can't call for help.

SP: Lego Master.

SE: You experience a matter-antimatter annihilation effect if you touch a Mega Blok. (And Mega Blok contamination in Lego collections is rather common.)

SP: Can dig and build like Minecraft in the real world.

A creeper comes…Ssssssssss…Boom! 

Best sniper ever.

SE: You shoot a shot around the world and die when it hits you in the back of the head.

SP: Can dodge anything.

SE: You now involuntarily dodge everything you try to eat or drink.

SP: Can survive anywhere from Earth sea level to vacuum

SE: You're a cyborg and you're vulnerable to getting hacked.

SP: Conjuring any sandwich you choose from thin air.

No air. 

Receive a cup of 7-up every second.

side effect: the 7up you receive are all contaminated with alcohol, caffeine, dissolved hard candies, and cough syrup

super power: i believe i can fly, i believe i can touch the sky, i think about it every night and day, spread my wings and fly away

SE: You are sued for copyright.

SP: I can fly like an Eagle, to the sea, fly like an Eagle, let the spirit carry me, I can fly fly fly, till I'm free, fly right into the future.

FBI! OPEN THE DOOR! 

I wish I can beat FBI.

You get beaten by your police department instead

i wish that I could figure out a way to take out ICBMs

Granted. You figure out a way that needs antimatter. 

I can burn anything.

This is the superpower thread, would you please stop corrupting game threads.

SE: You are sued for copyright.

SP: I can fly like an Eagle, to the sea, fly like an Eagle, let the spirit carry me, I can fly fly fly, till I'm free, fly right into the future.
